extendedInfo.description: "This is a live wallpaper with interactive capabilities, a Happy New Year 2013 background. Press the falling objects and watch them turn into two different sayings, "Celebrate", "Happy New Year" and confetti. Wallpaper scrolls left to right as the flags fall to your customization.The features included in this wallpaper are:Hide Items (only displays wallpaper without the flags falling)Disable Interaction (falling objects with interaction disabled)Direction ( choose the direction of the moving objects, up, down, left or right)Speed (Choose between three speeds, grandma, normal, zoom)Hit Counter (Displays counter on live wallpaper to record how many times you've pressed the objects, you can also disable it)""This app contains ads that may appear in the notification tray or homescreen as an Icon. By Downloading this app you will be agreeing to Opt-in to the ad networks below You can optout the ads from the links below: Airpush Optout: http://www.airpush.com/optout Leadbolt Optout: http://opt.leadbolt.com/ SendDroid Optout: http://senddroid.com/opt-out/ To delete the icons just hold your finger on them and drag to the trash can to delete."
